title: cozy 2.5 room flat at humboldthain park
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


very quiet, lightfull 2.5 room apartment. 3rd floor, open kitchen, one living/sleeping room, one kids room  with a double bed and a pretty and  delicate bed built above. bathtub, washing mashine, dish washer, internet, a real piano, backyard garden with playground, big balcony with a couch ! :) free from  29.07. till  29.08.
i am renting out as we go on holiday kind of spontaneously. thats why the low price - its a very nice flat ! just contact me pls 
Danke :)

017620216126
